text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Thank you so much, Trainer! I shall take<n>good
care of these and use them to<n>decorate my room!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Oh no, these are tiny compared to the<n>ones I
brought from home.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
In fact, this size would be easier to<n>snuggle up
with and fall asle—

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, you won these plushies for me,<n>so I shall
treasure them always!
